kv4.3:5.3: Maggo phalaṃ nibbānaṃ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṃ, sakadāgāmimaggo sakadāgāmiphalaṃ, anāgāmimaggo anāgāmiphalaṃ, arahattamaggo arahattaphalaṃ, satipaṭṭhānaṃ sammappadhānaṃ iddhipādo indriyaṃ balaṃ bojjhaṅgoti?
kv4.3:6.8: Maggo phalaṃ nibbānaṃ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṃ … pe …
kv4.3:7.10: Maggo phalaṃ nibbānaṃ, sotāpattimaggo sotāpattiphalaṃ … pe …
kv4.3:8.3: Arahato kāyo paggahaniggahupago chedanabhedanupago kākehi gijjhehi kulalehi sādhāraṇoti?
kv4.3:8.5: Anāsavo dhammo paggahaniggahupago chedanabhedanupago kākehi gijjhehi kulalehi sādhāraṇoti?
kv4.3:9.1: Arahato kāye visaṃ kameyya, satthaṃ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv4.3:9.3: Anāsave dhamme visaṃ kameyya, satthaṃ kameyya, aggi kameyyāti?
kv4.3:10.1: Labbhā arahato kāyo addubandhanena bandhituṃ, rajjubandhanena bandhituṃ, saṅkhalikabandhanena bandhituṃ, gāmabandhanena bandhituṃ, nigamabandhanena bandhituṃ, nagarabandhanena bandhituṃ, janapadabandhanena bandhituṃ, kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitunti?
kv4.3:10.3: Labbhā anāsavo dhammo addubandhanena bandhituṃ, rajjubandhanena bandhituṃ, saṅkhalikabandhanena bandhituṃ, gāmanigamanagarajanapadabandhanena bandhituṃ, kaṇṭhapañcamehi bandhanehi bandhitunti?
kv4.3:11.1: Yadi arahā puthujjanassa cīvaraṃ deti, anāsavaṃ hutvā sāsavaṃ hotīti?
kv4.3:12.1: Yadi arahā puthujjanassa piṇḍapātaṃ deti, senāsanaṃ deti, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ deti, anāsavo hutvā sāsavo hotīti?
kv4.3:13.1: Yadi puthujjano arahato cīvaraṃ deti, sāsavaṃ hutvā anāsavaṃ hotīti?
kv4.3:14.1: Yadi puthujjano arahato piṇḍapātaṃ deti, senāsanaṃ deti, gilānapaccayabhesajjaparikkhāraṃ deti, sāsavo hutvā anāsavo hotīti?
kv4.3:15.6: Hañci arahā anāsavo, tena vata re vattabbe—
